Package javelin.model.item.relic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Amulet
    restores all used spells, recovers hp and eliminates conditions
    Ankh
    Recovers full hp and applies heroism to squad units for a day
    Candle
    Brings a single creature to 1hp.
    Crown
    Gives +5 to each skill for a week (all-knowing condition)
    Flute
    Summons a FlyingNimbus.
    Map
    Terraforms surroundings (3x3?) except to/from water.
    Relic
    TODO placeholder for real relics
    Skull
    Damages all good creatures in battle (1-99% will save).
